episodes.title: Nathan Chasing Horse found guilty on several sexual assault counts
episodes.description:
Nathan Chasing Horse was convicted on multiple counts of sexual assault on Friday following an 11-day trial.

The “Dances with Wolves” actor was found guilty on 13 of 21 charges, including sexual assault with a minor and under 14 in producing pornography.

Additionally, he was found not guilty of 8 other charges, including kidnapping, according to the District Attorney's office.

MORE: https://news3lv.com/news/local/nathan-chasing-horse-found-guilty-on-several-sexual-assault-counts

episodes.title: Las Vegas trial to begin for 'Dances With Wolves' actor charged with multiple sex crimes
episodes.description:
A Las Vegas trial is scheduled to begin Tuesday in the sexual assault case against "Dances With Wolves" actor Nathan Chasing Horse.

Chasing Horse, also known as Nathan Lee Chasing His Horse, was first arrested in 2023. 

Authorities said they conducted a monthslong investigation into allegations that he used his role as a so-called medicine man to lead a cult and abuse young Indigenous women and girls.

MORE: https://news3lv.com/news/local/las-vegas-trial-dances-with-wolves-actor-nathan-chasing-horse-sex-crimes-cult-north-las-vegas-nevada-court-judge-prosecutors

episodes.title: Nathan Chasing Horse, 'Dances with Wolves', actor armed cult against cops
episodes.description:
Nathan Chasing Horse trained his wives to use firearms, instructing them to “shoot it out” with police officers if they ever tried to “break their family apart,” according to records obtained by The Associated Press. If that failed, the actor from “Dancing With Wolves” said they should take “suicide pills.”

The abuse that authorities said spanned two decades led Tuesday to the arrest of Chasing Horse following a monthslong investigation by Las Vegas police. He was taken into custody as he left the home he shares with his five wives in North Las Vegas. SWAT officers were seen outside the two-story home in the evening as detectives searched the property.

During the raid, police found memory cards with videos of the sexual assaults, firearms, 41 pounds of marijuana and psilocybin mushrooms in the home, according to an arrest report released Wednesday.


Full Story https://news3lv.com/news/local/records-dances-with-wolves-actor-armed-cult-against-cops#

Plus, Clark County DA answers questions on violent Oregon kidnapping suspect’s Nevada jail time, and Resort Corridor Court targets crime on Las Vegas Strip
